title: New Nashor's Tooth Build Path
body:
{{item:3113}} + {{item:3101}} + 820g = {{item:3115}} (2920g)
CDR Unchanged.
AP Unchanged.
Passive Unchanged.
Now grants 6% Movement Speed.

Just a thought I had when thinking about the interchangeability between Lich Bane and Nashor's Tooth.

replies.body: Don't you dare touch Azir's nashor's tooth.

"CDR Unchanged. AP Unchanged. Passive Unchanged. **Now *also* grants 6% Movement speed.**

Yes. Poor Azir. This change will definitely gut him.

> [{quoted}](name=Red Arrow,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wrlKsVGr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-04-24T13:20:15.945+0000)
>
> "CDR Unchanged. AP Unchanged. Passive Unchanged. **Now *also* grants 6% Movement speed.**
> 
> Yes. Poor Azir. This change will definitely gut him.

I'm saying this is a startlingly optimistic buff suggestion. It's fine as it is, maybe even too strong on the champs who use it well. If it gets any attention, I sincerely doubt it'll be this buffed. Better to leave it alone.
Yep price of the recipe its now higher (200g)
It's actually exactly the same. I took the total cost of the existing Nashor's Tooth then subtracted the new component costs.
So Nashor tooth  cost the same (2920g) but grants 5% of the mov spd? Its a buff, 5% is equivalent to 198g, so Nashor tooth need a price increase 3120 and grants the 6% of MS

I'd rather see {{item:3101}} reciveing some small ms.
It just builts into {{item:3172}} {{item:3115}} , so if nashors gets ms, every item building out of stinger grants ms, it would just be fitting if stinger offers ms itself then.

Its also a buff though. If they lowered its attack speed To 40 sure. I wounldnt mind since movement speed can help you attack faster if kiited. So it would sort of cancel out and give you better positioning. 
But I think its designed to be good if paired with{{item:3116}}

I would like another tenacity item though aside from mercs so I can get zerker grieves. 
Maybe an item that give tenacity with a conditional that you also equip zerker gireves.
I was just thinking in terms of champions such as AP Kog'Maw who the item could be potentially good on but it would leave them with very little movement speed.
